name: Chicken (Urutau Dev Studios)
description:
This is a small project made for Gdevelop GameJam 2. The objective of the game is basically to help the chicken get the keys and open the doors. Along the way you will have to pass some challenges until you reach your goal. Please leave your comment if you find any problem in the game, it will help me to improve the project. Game Play link: Keyboards:
  • Space or Up Arrow = Jump;
  • Left Arrow / Right Arrow = Move ;
